message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to enhance your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,000. It's a fair compromise considering the product's value to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm proposing $9,750. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $9,750. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $10,800. It's the lowest I can go while still making a reasonable profit.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm proposing $9,250. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.

Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $9,250. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10,500. This is the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'm proposing $10,250. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.

Bob, I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting close to the point where I may need to consider other offers. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to know that you're serious about making a deal. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,300. This is my final offer.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I've gone as low as I can, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'm proposing $9,900. This is my final offer.
